text: hey folks it's arjent from Lang chain
and today I'm excited to announce a new

to walk you through what that looks like
within the studio UI and then I'm going
to show you my code and the setup
necessary to enable this feature so you
can see here in this call model node I
have this edit node configuration button
and when I open this up I see two
settings for this node that I can
configure I can edit the system prompt
that this node uses and I can also edit
the underlying model that this node uses
so taking a look here at this thread I

here I get this

defined and lra nodes is an array that

essentially any node that's defined
inside of this array the studio UI will
know to tag this field with this
node similarly langra type which I can

model and the way that we load the

and then pull this logic directly into

Define and edit my prompts directly

right now we're just returning our
Search tool which just uses Tav but I'm

depending on what's defined in our

so right we can see here that search is

the search
